get.description: List of Money and Bet Percentage splits for each outcome type available in this market. This specific endpoint will return the movement from this market as well as the most recent.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: The MarketId of the desired market for which to pull splits.

get.description: List of Money and Bet Percentage splits for each market and their respective outcome types available in this game. This specific endpoint will return current splits for each available market and no line movement.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: gameid
parameters.description: The ID of the game for which you want to receive splits for.Example 11778

get.description: Returns all outcomes under this market which have a result type associated. Will return empty list if resulting has not yet processed for the given game. Resulting processes shortly after game closing.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: BettingMarketID of the market for which you would like to see resulted outcomes. Valid example ID 17819

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: The unique GameID of the game in question.
